description:
Lina`s party continues their journey to Sayloon kingdom. On their way, Lina sees the sign for the "legendary dragon food" and gets excited.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bikkuri Cooking! Maboroshi no Dragon o Oe!
Sudden Cooking! Follow the Phantom Dragon!
Une recette fabuleuse (La pêche du dragon légendaire)
Нежданная готовка! Погоня за призрачным драконом!
びっくり料理[クッキング]! 幻のドラゴンを追え!
